trans-unit.source: Exposes static methods for creating, moving, and enumerating through directories and subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 公开用于通过目录和子目录进行创建、移动和枚举的静态方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Directory> class for typical operations such as copying, moving, renaming, creating, and deleting directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Directory>类用于典型操作，如复制、 移动、 重命名、 创建和删除的目录。

trans-unit.source: To create a directory, use one of the <xref:System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建目录，请使用之一<xref:System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To delete a directory, use one of the <xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除某个目录，使用之一<xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the current directory for an app, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取或设置应用程序的当前目录，使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To manipulate <xref:System.DateTime> information related to the creation, access, and writing of a directory, use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetLastAccessTime%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetCreationTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要操作<xref:System.DateTime>与相关的信息创建、 访问和写入目录的使用方法，如<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetLastAccessTime%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetCreationTime%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The static methods of the <xref:System.IO.Directory> class perform security checks on all methods.
trans-unit.target: 静态方法<xref:System.IO.Directory>类执行的所有方法的安全检查。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to reuse an object several times, consider using the corresponding instance method of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> instead, because the security check will not always be necessary.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要重用多次的某个对象，请考虑使用相应的实例方法的<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>相反，因为安全检查将不总是有必要。

trans-unit.source: If you are performing only one directory-related action, it might be more efficient to use a static <xref:System.IO.Directory> method rather than a corresponding <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> instance method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在执行只有一个与目录相关的操作，则可能是使用静态更加高效<xref:System.IO.Directory>方法，而不是相应<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>实例方法。

trans-unit.source: Most <xref:System.IO.Directory> methods require the path to the directory that you are manipulating.
trans-unit.target: 大多数<xref:System.IO.Directory>方法要求您操作的目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a string `path` parameter, that path must be well-formed or an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 在接受字符串的成员`path`参数，该路径必须是格式正确，或引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a path is fully qualified but begins with a space (" c:\temp"), the path string isn't trimmed, so the path is considered malformed and an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果路径是完全限定的但空格 ("c:\temp") 开头，路径字符串未删除，因此被认为是路径格式不正确，并引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a path or a combination of paths cannot be fully qualified twice.
trans-unit.target: 此外，路径或组合的路径不能完全限定两次。

trans-unit.source: For example, "c:\temp c:\windows" also raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"c:\temp c:\windows"也会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your paths are well-formed when using methods that accept a path string.
trans-unit.target: 确保使用接受将路径字符串的方法时，你的路径格式正确。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.IO.Path>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.IO.Path>。

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a path, the path can refer to a file or a directory.
trans-unit.target: 在接受路径的成员，该路径可以引用文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: You can use a full path, a relative path, or a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path for a server and share name.
trans-unit.target: 服务器和共享名称，可以使用完整的路径、 相对路径或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, all the following are acceptable paths:
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下所有条件都可接受的路径：

trans-unit.source: "c:\\\MyDir" in C#, or "c:\MyDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "c:\\\MyDir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"c:\MyDir"。

trans-unit.source: "MyDir\\\MySubdir" in C#, or "MyDir\MySubDir" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "MyDir\\\MySubdir"在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的"MyDir\MySubDir"。

trans-unit.source: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare" in C#, or "\\\MyServer\MyShare" in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: "\\\\\\\MyServer\\\MyShare"在 C# 中，或"\\\MyServer\MyShare"在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: By default, full read/write access to new directories is granted to all users.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对新目录的完全读/写访问权限授予所有用户。

trans-unit.source: However, the app must have the correct security to access existing directories.
trans-unit.target: 但是，应用程序必须具有正确的安全访问现有的目录。

trans-unit.source: To demand permissions for a directory and all its subdirectories, end the path string with the directory separator character.
trans-unit.target: 为目录和所有其子目录，结束以目录分隔符字符的路径字符串的请求权限。

trans-unit.source: (For example, "C:\Temp\\" grants access to C:\Temp\ and all its subdirectories.) To demand permissions only for a specific directory, end the path string with a period.
trans-unit.target: (例如，"C:\Temp\\"C:\Temp\ 和所有子目录授予访问权限。)仅为特定目录，最终有时间段的路径字符串的请求权限。

trans-unit.source: (For example, "C:\Temp\\."
trans-unit.target: (例如，"C:\Temp\\。"

trans-unit.source: grants access only to C:\Temp\\, not to its subdirectories.)
trans-unit.target: 授予访问权限仅为 C:\Temp\\，而不适用于及其子目录。)

trans-unit.source: In members that accept a `searchPattern` parameter, the search string can be any combination of literal characters and two wildcard characters; \* and ?.
trans-unit.target: 在接受的成员`searchPattern`参数，搜索字符串可以是任意组合的原义字符和两个通配符;\*和？。

trans-unit.source: This parameter does not recognize regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数不能识别正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method or any other method that uses the `searchPattern` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法或使用任何其他方法`searchPattern`参数。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Directory> and <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> are not supported for use in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory> 和<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>不支持用于[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]应用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to access files and folders in [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps, see [Accessing data and files (Windows Store apps)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何访问中文件和文件夹信息[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]应用程序，请参阅[访问数据和文件 （Windows 应用商店应用）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh758319.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files from a directory and move them to a new directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从目录中检索所有文本文件，并将它们移到新目录。

trans-unit.source: After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory.
trans-unit.target: 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在原始的目录中。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> method to retrieve a collection of text files from a directory, and then use that collection in a query to find all the lines that contain "Example".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>方法从一个目录，检索文本文件的集合，然后在查询中使用该集合以查找包含"示例"的所有行。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to move a directory and all its files to a new directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将一个目录及其所有文件移动到新目录。

trans-unit.source: The original directory no longer exists after it has been moved.
trans-unit.target: 原始目录不再存在之后它已移动。

trans-unit.source: Creates all the directories in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 在指定路径中创建所有目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的目录。

trans-unit.source: Creates all directories and subdirectories in the specified path unless they already exist.
trans-unit.target: 在指定路径中创建所有目录和子目录，除非它们已经存在。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the directory at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示在指定路径的目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is returned regardless of whether a directory at the specified path already exists.
trans-unit.target: 无论指定路径的目录是否已经存在，都将返回此对象。

trans-unit.source: Any and all directories specified in `path` are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的所有目录`path`创建的除非它们已经存在，或除非的某些部分`path`无效。

trans-unit.source: If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> object for the existing directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果该目录已存在，此方法不会创建一个新目录，但它将返回<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>现有目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数指定一个目录路径，而不是文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前创建的目录的参数。

trans-unit.source: You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在具有写访问权限的共享上的远程计算机上创建一个目录。

trans-unit.source: UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#.
trans-unit.target: 支持 UNC 路径;例如，可以指定以下项作为`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 中，和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。

trans-unit.source: Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported, and will cause a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用仅冒号字符 （:） 创建一个目录不支持，并将导致`NotSupportedException`引发。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and deletes the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并删除指定的目录。

trans-unit.target: 若要创建的目录 C:\Users\User1\Public\Html C:\Users\User1 当前目录时，使用任何以下调用以确保正确解释反斜杠。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic:
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic:

trans-unit.source: In C#:
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中：

trans-unit.source: In C++:
trans-unit.target: 在 c + +:

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> is a file.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录是文件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The network name is not known.
trans-unit.target: 网络名称未知。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is prefixed with, or contains, only a colon character (:).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 的前缀仅为（或只包含）一个冒号字符 (:)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> contains a colon character (:) that is not part of a drive label ("C:\\").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 包含不是驱动器标签（“C:\\”）的一部分的冒号字符 (:)。

trans-unit.source: for reading and writing files or directories.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取和写入文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The directory to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的目录。

trans-unit.source: The access control to apply to the directory.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于此目录的访问控制。

trans-unit.source: Creates all the directories in the specified path, unless the already exist, applying the specified Windows security.
trans-unit.target: 在指定路径中创建所有目录（除非已存在），并应用指定的 Windows 安全性。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the directory at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示在指定路径的目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is returned regardless of whether a directory at the specified path already exists.
trans-unit.target: 无论指定路径的目录是否已经存在，都将返回此对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to create a directory with access control, so there is no chance the directory can be accessed before security is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法重载来创建一个目录的访问控制，以便在安全设置会应用之前，可以访问该目录不会。

trans-unit.source: Any and all directories specified in the `path` parameter are created, unless they already exist or unless some part of `path` is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的所有目录`path`创建参数，除非它们已经存在，或除非的某些部分`path`无效。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter specifies a directory path, not a file path.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数指定一个目录路径，而不是文件路径。

trans-unit.source: If the directory already exists, this method does not create a new directory, but it returns a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo> object for the existing directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果该目录已存在，此方法不会创建一个新目录，但它将返回<xref:System.IO.DirectoryInfo>现有目录的对象。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before creating the directory.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前创建的目录的参数。

trans-unit.source: You can create a directory on a remote computer, on a share that you have write access to.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在具有写访问权限的共享上的远程计算机上创建一个目录。

trans-unit.source: UNC paths are supported; for example, you can specify the following for `path`: `\\2009\Archives\December` in Visual Basic, and `\\\\2009\\Archives\\December` in C#.
trans-unit.target: 支持 UNC 路径;例如，可以指定以下项作为`path`:`\\2009\Archives\December`在 Visual Basic 中，和`\\\\2009\\Archives\\December`C# 中。

trans-unit.source: Creating a directory with only the colon character (:) is not supported and causes a `NotSupportedException` to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 使用仅冒号字符 （:） 创建一个目录不支持，这会导致`NotSupportedException`引发。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new directory with access rules for two user accounts.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个新目录与两个用户帐户的访问规则。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录是文件。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The network name is not known.
trans-unit.target: 网络名称未知。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is prefixed with, or contains, only a colon character (:).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 的前缀仅为（或只包含）一个冒号字符 (:)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> contains a colon character (:) that is not part of a drive label ("C:\\").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 包含不是驱动器标签（“C:\\”）的一部分的冒号字符 (:)。

trans-unit.source: for reading and writing files and directories and for access to the destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取和写入文件和目录以及用于访问目标目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" /> Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />，<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />安全操作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: Deletes a specified directory, and optionally any subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定目录及（可选地）删除其任意子目录。

trans-unit.source: The name of the empty directory to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的空目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: This directory must be writable and empty.
trans-unit.target: 此目录必须可写且为空。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an empty directory from a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 从指定路径删除空目录。

trans-unit.source: This method behaves identically to <xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `false` specified for the second parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的行为相同与<xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>与`false`为第二个参数指定。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前删除目录的参数。

trans-unit.source: This method throws an <xref:System.IO.IOException> if the directory specified in the `path` parameter contains files or subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将引发<xref:System.IO.IOException>如果中指定的目录`path`参数包含文件或子目录。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the <xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A> method may not be able to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，如果必须在文件资源管理器中打开的指定的目录<xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A>方法可能不能将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new directory and subdirectory, and then delete only the subdirectory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个新目录和子目录，，然后删除仅的子目录。

trans-unit.source: A file with the same name and location specified by <paramref name="path" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: 存在具有相同名称和 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的位置的文件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory is the application's current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 该目录是应用程序的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> is not empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录不为空。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory is read-only or contains a read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 该目录为只读或包含一个只读文件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 另一个进程正在使用该目录。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> does not exist or could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 不存在或找不到 <paramref name="path" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: for writing to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入到指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to remove directories, subdirectories, and files in <c>path</c>; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除 <c>path</c> 中的目录、子目录和文件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified directory and, if indicated, any subdirectories and files in the directory.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定的目录，并删除该目录中的所有子目录和文件（如果表示）。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter may specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before deleting the directory.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前删除目录的参数。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the `recursive` parameter is `true`, the user must have write permission for the current directory as well as for all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 如果`recursive`参数是`true`，用户必须具有对当前目录及其所有子目录的写入权限。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this method differs slightly when deleting a directory that contains a reparse point, such as a symbolic link or a mount point.
trans-unit.target: 删除包含重新分析点，如符号链接或装入点的目录时，此方法的行为略有不同。

trans-unit.source: If the reparse point is a directory, such as a mount point, it is unmounted and the mount point is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新分析点是一个目录，如装入点，它将卸载和删除该装入点。

trans-unit.source: This method does not recurse through the reparse point.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不通过重新分析点进行递归。

trans-unit.source: If the reparse point is a symbolic link to a file, the reparse point is deleted and not the target of the symbolic link.
trans-unit.target: 如果重新分析点文件的符号链接，则删除重新分析点和不符号链接的目标。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, if you have the specified directory open in File Explorer, the <xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A> method may not be able to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，如果必须在文件资源管理器中打开的指定的目录<xref:System.IO.Directory.Delete%2A>方法可能不能将其删除。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a new directory, subdirectory, and file in the subdirectory, and then recursively delete all the new items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建新的目录、 子目录和文件的子目录中，然后以递归方式删除所有新项。

trans-unit.source: A file with the same name and location specified by <paramref name="path" /> exists.
trans-unit.target: 存在具有相同名称和 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的位置的文件。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> is read-only, or <paramref name="recursive" /> is <see langword="false" /> and <paramref name="path" /> is not an empty directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录为只读，或者 <paramref name="recursive" /> 的值为 <see langword="false" />，且 <paramref name="path" /> 不是空目录。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory is the application's current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 该目录是应用程序的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory contains a read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 该目录包含一个只读文件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The directory is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 另一个进程正在使用该目录。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> does not exist or could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 不存在或找不到 <paramref name="path" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: for writing to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入到指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names that meet specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 返回满足指定条件的目录名的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中的目录名的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the directories in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个可枚举集合，它包含目录中由 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录的完整名称（包括路径）。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定中的相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the top-level directories in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举指定路径中的顶级目录。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is invalid, such as referring to an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 无效，如引用未映射的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or combined exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的目录名称匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names that match a search pattern in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的目录名的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the directories in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> and that match the specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定且与指定的搜索模式相匹配的目录中的文件的全名（包括路径）的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定中的相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of directories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的目录名称匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or should include all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索操作是应仅包含当前目录还是应包含所有子目录的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of directory names that match a search pattern in a specified path, and optionally searches subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的目录名称的可枚举集合，还可以搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the directories in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> and that match the specified search pattern and option.
trans-unit.target: 一个可枚举集合，它包含 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录中与指定的搜索模式匹配的目录的完整名称（包括路径）。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Exactly one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的恰好一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative or absolute path information in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定中的相对或绝对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The returned directory names are prefixed with the value you provided in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回的目录名称的前缀中提供的值为`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you provide a relative path in the `path` parameter, the returned directory names will contain a relative path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你提供的相对路径`path`参数，返回的目录名称将包含相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates directories in a specified path that match a specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举指定路径中与指定的搜索模式匹配的目录。

trans-unit.source: It uses the `searchOption` parameter to specify that all subdirectories should be included in the search.
trans-unit.target: 它使用`searchOption`参数来指定应在搜索中包含所有子目录。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

<paramref name="searchPattern" /> does not contain a valid pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 不包含有效模式。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchOption" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.SearchOption" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is invalid, such as referring to an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 无效，如引用未映射的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or combined exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file names that meet specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 返回满足指定条件的文件名的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file names in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中的文件名的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the files in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个可枚举集合，它包含目录中 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的文件的完整名称（包括路径）。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定使用的相对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve all the files in a directory and move them to a new directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检索目录中的所有文件，并将它们移到新目录。

trans-unit.source: After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directory.
trans-unit.target: 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在原始的目录中。

trans-unit.source: The following example enumerates the files in the specified directory, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Europe".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例枚举中指定的目录的文件读取的文件，每一行，然后显示的行，如果它包含字符串"Europe"。

trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of files in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的文件名匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file names that match a search pattern in a specified path.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的文件名称的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the files in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> and that match the specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 指定且与指定的搜索模式相匹配的目录中的文件的全名（包括路径）的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定使用的相对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files in a directory and move them to a new directory.

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file names that match a search pattern in a specified path, and optionally searches subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的文件名称的可枚举集合，还可以搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of the full names (including paths) for the files in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> and that match the specified search pattern and option.
trans-unit.target: 一个可枚举集合，它包含 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录中与指定的搜索模式和选项匹配的文件的完整名称（包括路径）。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定使用的相对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve all the text files in a directory and its subdirectories, and move them to a new directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检索目录及其子目录中中的所有文本文件，并将它们移到新目录。

trans-unit.source: After the files are moved, they no longer exist in the original directories.
trans-unit.target: 将文件移动后，它们将不再存在的原始目录中。

trans-unit.source: The following example recursively enumerates all files that have a .txt extension, reads each line of the file, and displays the line if it contains the string "Microsoft".
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例以递归方式枚举所有扩展名为.txt 的文件读取的文件，每一行，然后显示的行，如果它包含字符串"Microsoft"。

trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or should include all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索操作是应仅包含当前目录还是应包含所有子目录的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of file names and directory names that match a search pattern in a specified path, and optionally searches subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的文件名称和目录名的可枚举集合，还可以搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of file-system entries in the directory specified by <paramref name="path" /> and that match the specified search pattern and option.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的目录中与指定搜索模式和选项匹配的文件系统项的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can specify relative path information with the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定使用的相对路径信息`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory, which you can determine by using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径的信息解释为相对于当前工作目录，你可以通过使用来确定<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举的项的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>，你必须等待的项到整个数组之前才能访问该数组返回。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The returned collection is not cached; each call to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A> on the collection will start a new enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 不缓存返回的集合;每次调用<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601.GetEnumerator%2A>在集合上将启动一个新的枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="searchPattern" /> does not contain a valid pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 不包含有效模式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchOption" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.SearchOption" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is invalid, such as referring to an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 无效，如引用未映射的驱动器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or combined exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The path to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的路径。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given path refers to an existing directory on disk.
trans-unit.target: 确定给定路径是否引用磁盘上的现有目录。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="path" /> refers to an existing directory; <see langword="false" /> if the directory does not exist or an error occurs when trying to determine if the specified directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="path" /> 指向现有目录，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果该目录不存在或者在尝试确定指定目录是否存在时出错，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before checking whether the directory exists.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`再进行检查目录是否存在的参数。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If you do not have at a minimum read-only permission to the directory, the <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A> method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有在目录中，最小的只读权限<xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A>方法将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A> method returns `false` if any error occurs while trying to determine if the specified file exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.Exists%2A>方法返回`false`如果在尝试确定指定的文件是否存在任何错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: This can occur in situations that raise exceptions such as passing a file name with invalid characters or too many characters, a failing or missing disk, or if the caller does not have permission to read the file.
trans-unit.target: 在引发异常，例如传递具有无效的字符或太多字符，磁盘失效或缺失的文件名的情况下可能发生这或如果调用方没有权限读取此文件。

trans-unit.source: The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例采用命令行上的文件或目录的名称的数组，确定哪种类型的名称，然后相应地进行处理。

trans-unit.source: for reading files.
trans-unit.target: 用于读取文件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the Windows access control list (ACL) for a directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回某个目录的 Windows 访问控制列表 (ACL)。

trans-unit.source: The path to a directory containing a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object that describes the file's access control list (ACL) information.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 对象的目录的路径，该对象描述文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for a specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 对象，该对象封装指定目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the access control rules for the file described by the <paramref name="path" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个封装由 <paramref name="path" /> 参数描述的文件的访问控制规则的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries for a directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件或目录上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 环境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>如果用户具有向用户授予<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>上的父文件夹的权限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>上的父目录。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> and the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法以添加访问控制列表 (ACL) 项，然后从目录中删除的 ACL 项。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the creation date and time of a directory.

trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于<xref:System.IO.File.GetCreationTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the directory described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: 如果目录中所述`path`参数不存在，此方法将返回第午夜 12:00 到公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), adjusted to local time.
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)为本地时间调整协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory.

trans-unit.source: Gets the creation date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) format, of a directory.
trans-unit.target: 获取目录创建的日期和时间，其格式为协调通用时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: A structure that is set to the creation date and time for the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个设置为指定目录的创建日期和时间的结构。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 该值用 UTC 时间表示。

trans-unit.source: This method may return an inaccurate value, because it uses native functions whose values may not be continuously updated by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可能返回不准确的值，因为它使用其值可能不会持续更新由操作系统的本机函数。

trans-unit.source: If the directory described in the `path` parameter does not exist, this method returns 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

trans-unit.source: Gets the current working directory of the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，该字符串包含当前工作目录的路径且不以反斜杠 (\\) 结尾。

trans-unit.target: 当前目录是不同于原始的目录，它是从其启动该进程的一个。
