trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the `GetCurrentDirectory` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 `GetCurrentDirectory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows CE, which does not have current directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此操作系统为 Windows CE，该系统不具有当前目录功能。

trans-unit.source: This method is available in the .NET Compact Framework, but is not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在 .NET Compact Framework 中可用，但当前不支持。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问当前目录路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories that meet specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: 返回满足指定条件的子目录的名称。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories (including their paths) in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定目录中的子目录的名称（包括其路径）。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of subdirectories in the specified path, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定路径中子目录的完整名称（包含路径）的数组；如果未找到任何目录，则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> with the asterisk (\*) specified as the search pattern, so it returns all subdirectories.If you need to search subdirectories, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29> method, which enables you to specify a search of subdirectories with the `searchOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>带有星号 (\*) 指定与搜索模式，因此它将返回所有子目录。如果想要搜索子目录，使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29>方法，使你可以指定具有的子目录的搜索`searchOption`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The names returned by this method are prefixed with the directory information provided in `path`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的名称前加上中提供的目录信息`path`。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example takes an array of file or directory names on the command line, determines what kind of name it is, and processes it appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例采用命令行上的文件或目录的名称的数组，确定哪种类型的名称，然后相应地进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: for accessing path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问当前目录的路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of subdirectories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的子目录的名称匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本和通配符的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of subdirectories (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定目录中与指定的搜索模式匹配的子目录的名称（包括其路径）。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the search pattern in the specified directory, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目录中与搜索模式匹配的子目录的完整名称（包含路径）的数组；如果未找到任何文件，则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: This method returns all subdirectories directly under the specified directory that match the specified search pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与指定的搜索模式匹配的所有子目录直接在指定的目录下。

trans-unit.source: If the specified directory has no subdirectories, or no subdirectories match the `searchPattern` parameter, this method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的目录具有子目录，或者没有子目录匹配`searchPattern`参数，此方法返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Only the top directory is searched.
trans-unit.target: 仅顶级目录搜索。

trans-unit.source: If you want to search the subdirectories as well, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29> method and specify <xref:System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories> in the `searchOption` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要搜索子目录，使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IO.SearchOption%29>方法并指定<xref:System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories>中`searchOption`参数。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息，并且不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.

trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本和通配符的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定搜索操作是应包含所有子目录还是仅包含当前目录的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of the subdirectories (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory, and optionally searches subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回与在指定目录中的指定搜索模式匹配的子目录的名称（包括其路径），还可以选择地搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) of the subdirectories that match the specified criteria, or an empty array if no directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 与指定条件匹配的子目录的完整名称（包含路径）的数组；如果未找到任何目录，则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information, and is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息，并且不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetDirectories%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateDirectories%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.

trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of files (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定目录中与指定的搜索模式匹配的文件的名称（包含其路径）。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) for the files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern, or an empty array if no files are found.

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查针对使用 8.3 文件名称格式和长文件名的格式的文件名称，因为的搜索模式类似于"\*1\*.txt"可能会返回意外的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用的搜索模式"\*1\*.txt"返回"longfilename.txt"，因为等效 8.3 文件名称格式"LONGFI~1.TXT"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is not found or is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问当前目录路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of files in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的文件名匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include all subdirectories or only the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定搜索操作是应包含所有子目录还是仅包含当前目录的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of files (including their paths) that match the specified search pattern in the specified directory, using a value to determine whether to search subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定目录中与指定的搜索模式匹配的文件的名称（包含其路径），使用某个值确定是否要搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An array of the full names (including paths) for the files in the specified directory that match the specified search pattern and option, or an empty array if no files are found.
trans-unit.target: 指定目录中与指定的搜索模式和选项匹配的文件的完整名称（包含路径）的数组；如果未找到任何文件，则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: The returned file names are appended to the supplied parameter `path` and the order of the returned file names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 返回的文件名追加到所提供的参数`path`并不保证的顺序返回的文件的名称; 使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` can be a combination of literal and wildcard characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 可以是文本和通配符字符的组合，但它不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而"file*.txt"的搜索模式返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: Because this method checks against file names with both the 8.3 file name format and the long file name format, a search pattern similar to "\*1\*.txt" may return unexpected file names.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检查针对使用 8.3 文件名称格式和长文件名的格式的文件名称，因为的搜索模式类似于"\*1\*.txt"可能会返回意外的文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, using a search pattern of "\*1\*.txt" returns "longfilename.txt" because the equivalent 8.3 file name format is "LONGFI~1.TXT".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用的搜索模式"\*1\*.txt"返回"longfilename.txt"，因为等效 8.3 文件名称格式"LONGFI~1.TXT"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of names before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of names to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举名称的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A>，你必须等待的姓名是整个数组返回之前才能访问该数组。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The file names include the full path.

trans-unit.source: The following wildcard specifiers are permitted in `searchPattern`.
trans-unit.target: 中允许有以下通配说明符`searchPattern`。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard specifier
trans-unit.target: 通配符说明符

trans-unit.source: Matches
trans-unit.target: 匹配

trans-unit.source: \* (asterisk)
Zero or more characters in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或多个字符。

trans-unit.source: (question mark)
trans-unit.target: （问号）

trans-unit.source: Zero or one character in that position.
trans-unit.target: 在该位置的零个或一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Characters other than the wildcard are literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 非通配符字符是原义字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the `searchPattern` string "\*t" searches for all names in `path` ending with the letter "t".
trans-unit.target: 例如，`searchPattern`字符串"\*t"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"t"结尾。

trans-unit.source: The `searchPattern` string "s\*" searches for all names in `path` beginning with the letter "s".
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern`字符串"s\*"中的所有名称搜索`path`以字母"s"开头。

trans-unit.source: `searchPattern` cannot end in two periods ("..") or contain two periods ("..") followed by <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>, nor can it contain any invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: `searchPattern` 不能以两个句点结尾 ("...") 或包含两个句点 ("...") 后跟<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>，也可以包含任何无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters by using the <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <xref:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars%2A> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: When you use the asterisk wildcard character in a `searchPattern` such as "\*.txt", the number of characters in the specified extension affects the search as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的星号通配符`searchPattern`如"\*.txt"，指定的扩展中的字符数影响搜索，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the specified extension is exactly three characters long, the method returns files with extensions that begin with the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的扩展名为 3 个字符，该方法将返回具有指定扩展名，开始扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.xls" returns both "book.xls" and "book.xlsx".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.xls"返回"book.xls"和"book.xlsx"。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, the method returns files that exactly match the specified extension.
trans-unit.target: 在所有其他情况下，该方法返回与指定的扩展完全匹配的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, "\*.ai" returns "file.ai" but not "file.aif".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"\*.ai"返回"file.ai"但不是"file.aif"。

trans-unit.source: When you use the question mark wildcard character, this method returns only files that match the specified file extension.
trans-unit.target: 当使用问号通配符字符时，此方法将返回与匹配指定的文件扩展名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given two files, "file1.txt" and "file1.txtother", in a directory, a search pattern of "file?.txt" returns just the first file, whereas a search pattern of "file\*.txt" returns both files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在目录中，搜索模式的给定两个文件，"file1.txt"和"file1.txtother"，"文件？。txt"返回只是第一个文件，而搜索模式的"文件\*.txt"返回这两个文件。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> method to fill an array of strings with the names of all files matching a user-specified filter in a specific location and prints each string in the array to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>方法以用所有的名称填充的字符串数组文件匹配的特定位置中用户指定筛选器并输出到控制台数组中的每个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The example is configured to catch all errors common to this method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例配置为捕捉所有错误普遍适用于此方法。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法来查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> does not contain a valid pattern.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 不包含有效模式。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 或 <paramref name="searchPattern" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a file name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是一个文件名。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径无效（例如，它位于未映射的驱动器上）。

trans-unit.source: for access to path information for the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问当前目录路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute path to the directory to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的目录的相对或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: This string is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search string to match against the names of files and directories in <c>path</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <c>path</c> 中的文件和目录的名称匹配的搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以包含有效文本路径和通配符（* 和 ?）的组合，但不支持正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the search operation should include only the current directory or should include all subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索操作是应仅包含当前目录还是应包含所有子目录的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.IO.SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the file names and directory names that match a search pattern in a specified path, and optionally searches subdirectories.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定路径中与搜索模式匹配的所有文件名和目录名的数组，还可以搜索子目录。

trans-unit.source: An array of file the file names and directory names that match the specified search criteria, or an empty array if no files or directories are found.
trans-unit.target: 与指定的搜索条件匹配的文件名和目录名的数组；如果找不到任何文件或目录，则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned file and directory names is not guaranteed; use the <xref:System.Array.Sort%2A> method if a specific sort order is required.
trans-unit.target: 返回的文件和目录名称的顺序不能保证;使用<xref:System.Array.Sort%2A>方法是否需要特定的排序顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A> methods differ as follows: When you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>, you can start enumerating the collection of entries before the whole collection is returned; when you use <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>, you must wait for the whole array of entries to be returned before you can access the array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>方法的行为有所不同，如下所示： 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries%2A>，你可以启动之前，则返回整个集合枚举的项的集合; 当你使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFileSystemEntries%2A>，你必须等待的项到整个数组之前才能访问该数组返回。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you are working with many files and directories, <xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A> can be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当你正在使用许多文件和目录，<xref:System.IO.Directory.EnumerateFiles%2A>可能更有效。

trans-unit.source: The path for which to retrieve the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 要为其检索父目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the parent directory of the specified path, including both absolute and relative paths.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定路径的父目录，包括绝对路径和相对路径。

trans-unit.source: The parent directory, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="path" /> is the root directory, including the root of a UNC server or share name.
trans-unit.target: 父目录；或者如果 <paramref name="path" /> 是根目录，包括 UNC 服务器或共享名的根，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数可以指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the `path` parameter before getting the directory.
trans-unit.target: 从的末尾删除尾随空格`path`之前获取目录的参数。

trans-unit.source: The string returned by this method consists of all characters in the path up to, but not including, the last <xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar> or <xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>.
trans-unit.target: 通过此方法返回的字符串中的路径，但不是包括最后的所有字符都组成<xref:System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar>或<xref:System.IO.Path.AltDirectorySeparatorChar>。

trans-unit.source: For example, passing the path "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt" to <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A> returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory".
trans-unit.target: 例如，将"C:\Directory\SubDirectory\test.txt"的路径传递给<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetParent%2A>返回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"。

trans-unit.source: Passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory" returns "C:\Directory".
trans-unit.target: 传递"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"返回"C:\Directory"。

trans-unit.source: However, passing "C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\" returns "C:\Directory\SubDirectory", because the ending directory separator is after "SubDirectory".
trans-unit.target: 但是，传递"C:\Directory\SubDirectory\\"返回"C:\Directory\SubDirectory"，因为结束的目录分隔符之后"子目录"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file or directory to move.
trans-unit.target: 要移动的文件或目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path to the new location for <c>sourceDirName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 指向 <c>sourceDirName</c> 的新位置的路径。

trans-unit.source: If <c>sourceDirName</c> is a file, then <c>destDirName</c> must also be a file name.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>sourceDirName</c> 是文件，则 <c>destDirName</c> 也必须是文件名。

trans-unit.source: Moves a file or a directory and its contents to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 将文件或目录及其内容移到新位置。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new directory with the name specified by `destDirName` and moves the contents of `sourceDirName` to the newly created destination directory.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用指定的名称创建一个新目录`destDirName`，并将移动的内容`sourceDirName`到新创建的目标目录。

trans-unit.source: If you try to move a directory to a directory that already exists, an <xref:System.IO.IOException> will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试将目录移动到的目录中已存在，<xref:System.IO.IOException>将发生。

trans-unit.source: For example, an exception will occur if you try to move c:\mydir to c:\public, and c:\public already exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你尝试将 c:\mydir 移到 c:\public，并 c:\public 已存在，将发生异常。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you could specify "c:\\\public\\\mydir" as the `destDirName` parameter, provided that "mydir" does not exist under "c:\\\public", or specify a new directory name such as "c:\\\newdir".
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以指定"c:\\\public\\\mydir"作为`destDirName`参数，提供"mydir"不存在下"c:\\\public"，或指定新的目录名称，如"c:\\\newdir"。

trans-unit.source: The `sourceDirName` and `destDirName` arguments are permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `sourceDirName`和`destDirName`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Trailing spaces are removed from the end of the path parameters before moving the directory.
trans-unit.target: 将目录移动之前，从 path 参数末尾删除尾随空格。

trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 对象，描述要应用于 <c>path</c> 参数所描述的目录的 ACL 项。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> object to the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity" /> 对象描述的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项应用于指定的目录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法适用于表示非继承的 ACL 列表的文件的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for the `directorySecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the directory.
trans-unit.target: 为 ACL 指定`directorySecurity`参数替换现有的目录 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL and modify it.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加的新用户的权限，请使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法可以获取现有的 ACL 并对其进行修改。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file or directory.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述个人和/或组具有或没有执行到给定的文件或目录上的特定操作的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或移除访问控制列表项](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method persists only <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> objects that have been modified after object creation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法仍然仅存在<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>对象创建后已修改的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object has not been modified, it will not be persisted to a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>尚未修改对象，它不会保留到文件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is not possible to retrieve a <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from one file and reapply the same object to another file.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>对象从一个文件，并重新对同一对象应用到另一个文件。

trans-unit.source: To copy ACL information from one file to another:
trans-unit.target: 若要将 ACL 信息从一个文件复制到另一个：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object from the source file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>方法来检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>源文件中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object for the destination file.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>目标文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method of the source <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to retrieve the ACL information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.GetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的源<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>要检索 ACL 信息对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A> method to copy the information retrieved in step 3 to the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorBinaryForm%2A>或<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.ObjectSecurity.SetSecurityDescriptorSddlForm%2A>方法的信息复制到目标的步骤 3 中检索<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>对象。

trans-unit.source: Set the destination <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity> object to the destination file using the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置目标<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.DirectorySecurity>到目标文件使用的对象<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In NTFS environments, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes> are granted to the user if the user has <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> rights on the parent folder.
trans-unit.target: 在 NTFS 环境中，<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>如果用户具有向用户授予<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>上的父文件夹的权限。

trans-unit.source: To deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes> and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>, deny <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory> on the parent directory.
trans-unit.target: 若要拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadAttributes>和<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ReadExtendedAttributes>，拒绝<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights.ListDirectory>上的父目录。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A> and the <xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A> methods to add an access control list (ACL) entry and then remove an ACL entry from a directory.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.Directory.SetAccessControl%2A>方法以添加访问控制列表 (ACL) 项，然后从目录中删除的 ACL 项。

trans-unit.source: You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example.
trans-unit.target: 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the differences in output when using Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) output.
trans-unit.target: 使用协调世界时 (UTC) 输出时，下面的示例演示在输出中的差异。

trans-unit.source: The specified path was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到指定路径。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为长度为零的字符串，仅包含空格，或包含一个或多个无效字符。

trans-unit.source: You can query for invalid characters with the <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Path.GetInvalidPathChars" /> 方法查询无效字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路径和/或文件名超过了系统定义的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在基于 Windows 的平台上，路径必须少于 248 个字符，且文件名必须少于 260 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

trans-unit.source: The current operating system is not Windows NT or later.
trans-unit.target: 当前操作系统不是 Windows NT 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="lastAccessTimeUtc" /> specifies a value outside the range of dates or times permitted for this operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lastAccessTimeUtc" /> 指定一个超出该操作允许的日期或时间范围的值。

trans-unit.source: for writing to the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入到指定的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The date and time the directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 上次写入目录的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in local time.
trans-unit.target: 该值用本地时间表示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time a directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 设置上次写入目录的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is permitted to specify relative or absolute path information.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数允许指定相对或绝对路径信息。

trans-unit.source: Relative path information is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 相对路径信息被解释为相对于当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the current working directory, see <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前工作目录，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetCurrentDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `path`参数不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common I/O tasks, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 通用 I/O 任务的列表，请参阅[通用 I/O 任务](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use `SetLastWriteTime`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="lastWriteTime" /> specifies a value outside the range of dates or times permitted for this operation.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="lastWriteTime" /> 指定一个超出该操作允许的日期或时间范围的值。

trans-unit.source: for writing to the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入到指定的文件或目录。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />

trans-unit.source: The path of the directory.
trans-unit.target: 目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The date and time the directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 上次写入目录的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed in UTC time.
trans-unit.target: 该值用 UTC 时间表示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the date and time, in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) format, that a directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: 设置上次写入某个目录的日期和时间，其格式为协调通用时 (UTC)。
